author: Staff Reporter
text:
Helpline for lost chidren

The Chennai District Collector has urged people to call the ‘1098’ helpline in case they find children lost or abandoned at public places. In a press release, Collector K. Govindaraj stated that under the ‘Operation Smile’ programme, more than 3,000 children who had been found lost in Railway stations, bus stops, places of worship, tourist spots and other public places had been rescued and reunited with their families successfully.

Additionally, as a part of ‘Operation Muskaan’ between July 1 to 31 in 2015, 122 missing children in Chennai had been reunited with their families. - Staff Reporter
title: Helpline for lost and abandoned children
